page.title: 08 Education
page.content: There are no schools of any kind in our D Block.The children below 11 years of age who live in the area either attend the state schools in Ettington or Butlers Marston.These schools have the following catchment areas;Ettington_Pillerton Priors, Butlers Marston_Pillerton Hersey, Butlers Marston and Combroke.Fulready belongs to Tysoe.The number on roll in these schools,Butlers Marston 32 Ettington 130 and Tysoe 152 has been greatly reduced recently.Some children attend private (fee paying)school in Warwick and Stratford upon Avon. The three schools who provide education for our area are all Church of England schools.This means that although they are supported by the state the children attending them are given a Christian education linked with the church.
